summary: What this mod will do is heavily update Skyrim\'s Smelting and Tanning Racks, this is a must for any true Skyrim player. This will allow you to \"strip\" leather items back to there orginal leather, melt down armor for there precious ingots, and so much more!
descriptionHtml:
What this mod will do is heavily update Skyrim\'s Smelting and Tanning Racks, this is a must for any true Skyrim player. This will allow you to \"strip\" leather items back to there orginal leather, melt down armor for there precious ingots, and so much more!

Please check the bottom for what you currenty can, and cannot be \"stripped\" or \"melted\". If it is on the list, it CAN be melted or stripped for its raw materials!


=============Change log============

-=-=-Version 1.0.3-=-=- 
- Added Dwarven Armor
- Added Drawven Weapons
- Added Daedric Armor
- Added Daedric Weapons
- Added Ebony Armor
- Added Ebony Weapons
- Added Skyforge requirement for Daedric and Dragon related items

-=-=-Version 1.0.2-=-=- 
==Big Update!==
- Added Scale Armor
- Added Dragon Armor
- Added Dragon Plate Armor
- Added Glass Armor
- Added Glass Weapons
- Added Eleven Armor
- Added Eleven Weapons
- Added Orcish Armor
- Added Orcish Weapons
- Starting to balance higher level armor and weapon smelting so it doesn\'t feel so much \"cheatingly\" when high level
- Fixed a Steel Weapon which was giving a Iron Ingots instead of Steel Ingots


-=-=-Version 1.0.1-=-=-
- Added Steel Armor
- Added Steel Weapons
- Added Steel Plate Armor
- Fixed a error with Iron Weapon
- Planning Stage for adding a \"Melter\" into the game so it will provide a better GUI of what your about to melt intead of the object your creating.


-=-=-Version 1.0.0-=-=-
- Started development on this modification for Skyrim.
- Added Iron Armor 
- Added Iron Weapons 





-------------------------Currently can do the following items;-------------------------

Leather Related; 
Armour - Leather Body, Leather Boots, Leather Helmet, Leather Gloves/Braces.
Weapons - 

==--==

Iron Ingot Related; 
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor, BrandedShield, BrandedArmor.
Weapons - Battle Axe, GreatSword, Mace, WarHammer, Sword.

==--==

Dwarven Related;
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Battle Axe, Bow, Dagger, Greatsword, Mace, Wword, Waraxe, Warhammer

==--==

Steel Ingot Related;
Armor - Cuffed&Shin Boots, Nordic&Imperial Gaunlets, Normal&Horned Helmet, Normal Armor, Shield.
Armor (Plate) - Armor, Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet.
Weapons - Battle Axe, GreatSword, Mace, WarHammer, Sword.

==--==

Orcish Related;
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Mace, Warhammer, Greatsword, Battle Axe, War Axe, Sword.

==--==
Eleven Related;
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor, GildedArmor.
Armor (Light) - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Mace, Warhammer, Greatsword, Battle Axe.

==--==

Glass Related;
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Bow, Mace, Warhammer, Greatsword, Battle Axe.

==--==

Ebony Related;
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Bow, Mace, Warhammer, Greatsword, Battle Axe.

==--==

DragonScale Related; (Note; Requires you to use Skyforge)
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Armor (Light) - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.

==--==

Daedric Related; (Note; Requires you to use Skyforge)
Armor - Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet, Shield, Armor.
Weapons - Battle Axe, Bow, Dagger, Greatsword, Mace, Wword, Waraxe, Warhammer

==--==


To be released...


Note; If you notice a bug please post it below or contact me on Steam.
author: Soto-bobsbees
